Conference Center.english: 1. The conference center has state-of-the-art facilities.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi ha strutture all'avanguardia.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias cuenta con instalaciones de última generación.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum verfügt über modernste Einrichtungen.

Conference Center.english: 2. We booked a conference room for the meeting.
Conference Center.italian: Abbiamo prenotato una sala conferenze per la riunione.
Conference Center.spanish: Hemos reservado una sala de conferencias para la reunión.
Conference Center.german: Wir haben einen Konferenzraum für das Treffen gebucht.

Conference Center.english: 3. The conference center is conveniently located near the airport.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi è situato in posizione comoda vicino all'aeroporto.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias está convenientemente ubicado cerca del aeropuerto.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum befindet sich günstig in der Nähe des Flughafens.

Conference Center.english: 4. The conference center offers catering services for events.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi offre servizi di catering per gli eventi.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias ofrece servicios de catering para eventos.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum bietet Catering-Services für Veranstaltungen an.

Conference Center.english: 5. The conference center can accommodate up to 500 people.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi può ospitare fino a 500 persone.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias puede albergar hasta 500 personas.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum bietet Platz für bis zu 500 Personen.

Conference Center.english: 6. The conference center has audiovisual equipment for presentations.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi dispone di attrezzature audiovisive per le presentazioni.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias cuenta con equipos audiovisuales para las presentaciones.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum verfügt über audiovisuelle Ausstattung für Präsentationen.

Conference Center.english: 7. The conference center has a spacious lobby for networking.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi ha una spaziosa hall per fare networking.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias tiene un amplio vestíbulo para hacer contactos.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum verfügt über eine geräumige Lobby zum Netzwerken.

Conference Center.english: 8. The conference center provides high-speed internet access.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi offre un accesso internet ad alta velocità.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias proporciona acceso a internet de alta velocidad.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum bietet High-Speed-Internetzugang.

Conference Center.english: 9. The conference center has multiple breakout rooms for workshops.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi dispone di diverse sale per workshop.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias tiene múltiples salas para talleres.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum verfügt über mehrere Seminar- und Workshopräume.

Conference Center.english: 10. The conference center offers on-site parking for attendees.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi offre parcheggio in loco per i partecipanti.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias ofrece estacionamiento en el lugar para los asistentes.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum bietet Parkplätze vor Ort für die Teilnehmer.

Conference Center.english: 11. The conference center has a dedicated staff to assist with event planning.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi dispone di uno staff dedicato per assistere nella pianificazione degli eventi.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias cuenta con un personal dedicado para ayudar en la planificación de eventos.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum verfügt über engagiertes Personal zur Unterstützung bei der Veranstaltungsplanung.

Conference Center.english: 12. The conference center offers comfortable seating arrangements.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi offre comodi posti a sedere.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias ofrece cómodos arreglos de asientos.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum bietet bequeme Sitzgelegenheiten.

Conference Center.english: 13. The conference center has natural lighting in all meeting rooms.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi dispone di illuminazione naturale in tutte le sale riunioni.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias tiene iluminación natural en todas las salas de reuniones.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum verfügt über Tageslicht in allen Tagungsräumen.

Conference Center.english: 14. The conference center offers a variety of catering options.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi offre una varietà di opzioni di catering.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias ofrece una variedad de opciones de catering.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum bietet eine Vielzahl von Catering-Optionen.

Conference Center.english: 15. The conference center has a comprehensive audio system.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi dispone di un sistema audio completo.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias cuenta con un sistema de audio integral.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum verfügt über eine umfassende Audioanlage.

Conference Center.english: 16. The conference center has flexible room setups for different event types.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi ha allestimenti flessibili per diversi tipi di eventi.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias cuenta con configuraciones de sala flexibles para diferentes tipos de eventos.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum bietet flexible Raumgestaltung für verschiedene Veranstaltungstypen.

Conference Center.english: 17. The conference center offers professional event planning services.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi offre servizi professionali di pianificazione eventi.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias ofrece servicios profesionales de planificación de eventos.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum bietet professionelle Veranstaltungsplanungsdienstleistungen.

Conference Center.english: 18. The conference center has an outdoor terrace for receptions.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi dispone di una terrazza esterna per i ricevimenti.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias tiene una terraza al aire libre para recepciones.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum verfügt über eine Außenterrasse für Empfänge.

Conference Center.english: 19. The conference center offers video conferencing capabilities.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi offre la possibilità di videoconferenze.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias ofrece capacidades de videoconferencia.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum bietet Videokonferenzmöglichkeiten.

Conference Center.english: 20. The conference center provides assistance with event registration.
Conference Center.italian: Il centro congressi fornisce assistenza con la registrazione degli eventi.
Conference Center.spanish: El centro de conferencias brinda asistencia con el registro de eventos.
Conference Center.german: Das Konferenzzentrum unterstützt bei der Veranstaltungsanmeldung.
